Summary: loud rumbel over the neighborhood then oposit direction bright red orange light traveling nw-n ascending completely stop light fade then dissapear
divs: Sighting Detailsa loud rumble slowly move across the neighborhood the night before. The next night hear it again rattling the windows so I ran out side to see nothing ,perplexed as the noise dissipates to the south i turn around to the north and see a bright red orange light coming from the nw sky getting brighter, it slows down and shifts to the northbound once then just stops blinks again dims and vanishes......wth!!! I got some of it on my camera. OOO its legit. This is the second time iv seen a similar light only this time I got it!
trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
There were no other sightings in Boise on or around April 25th 2013
